actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years which Representatives and Senators may serve in the Congress.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits to 12 the number of years which Representatives and Senators may serve in Congress. Limits to 18 the total number of years of service of a person who holds the office of Representative and who at another time holds the office of Senator.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years which Representatives and Senators may serve in the Congress.
